extendedInfo.description: Night Filter is an easy to use screen filter application for your Android phone or tablet. Night Filter makes it easy for you to dim your screen, adjust your color tint, and more! Use it to read at night with less eye strain and correct for an excessive screen tint.Featuresâ Adjust your screen's brightness and color.â Add quick shortcuts to your home screen.â Schedule the filter to start & stop at a specific time.And more! Download the app and try it out to see all of the features.Troubleshooting* If you accidentally turn your screen black, press volume up or volume down inside the app to turn off the filter, or power off your phone by holding the power button. * If "Override screen brightness" doesn't work, try turning off "auto brightness" from your settings. This feature may also cause your screen to turn off and/or the lockscreen to activate if the setting is too low.* Android may disable the "install" button when a screen filter application is running for security reasons.If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us by email. PermissionsDraw over other apps: Required for the screen filter to work.Full network access, view network connections: Used for Google AdMob.

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: Great app. Apply red screen off your in the dark about to sleep.. really helps the eyes :)
reviews.author: Yess Baa

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: I have the HTC One and I used to be able to disable the home and back light on my touch pad but it no longer turns off. I don\'t know after which update but I really love this app so please fix?
reviews.author: Silas Leo Halliwell

reviews.title: Too many keystrokes
reviews.comment: Clean design but I really wish this turned on automatically when you open the app. I launch this from a shortcut key and that would be less steps. I\'ll stick with Screen Filter til it gets this. Plus why can\'t we turn off the notification? I hate it and would at least like to know why it \"must\" be there.
reviews.author: Victoria Griffin

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Best screen filter out there. Perfect set of options. Love that it can also override the device brightness (set that to minimum to get the maximum darkness with the minimum filter).
reviews.author: Joe Gariano

reviews.title: Options to hide the running icon
reviews.comment: You can make it the best screen filter tool in store if you simply add an option to let users hide the running icon in status bar. Thanks developer
reviews.author: Tommy Chow

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works very well. It\'s simplistic in nature.
reviews.author: Shiman Wilmer

reviews.title: bug
reviews.comment: overriding screen brightness flashes screen, screen becomes plain white, disabling that functions solves the problem.
reviews.author: dharmendra parmar

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Thanks dev :) this app saved my lot of batt :) i prefer you guys should add % on display brightness values/manual add, and enable/disable notification option. Thumbs up guys.Rated 5 star, totally deserve it.
reviews.author: Mahbub Ahmad

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very useful to reduce brightness..
reviews.author: neethu chandraprakash

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I think it would be better if you could just enable it in certain apps.
reviews.author: Adrian Walker

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great idea man!!!
reviews.author: Fayaz Bin Salam

reviews.title: That\'s it
reviews.comment: Very good for eyes in darkness
reviews.author: Qusai Shaqra

reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Helps a lot with lessening eye strain
reviews.author: Kyle Hart

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Wow is all I have to say. Good job team!
reviews.author: Hamad Zafar

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: The best app to reduce screen brightness out there, great job developer! The only thing that I would like to have is a way to manually type the brightness values, the slider is tricky to adjust on my Xperia U.
reviews.author: Guilherme Souza Jr.

reviews.title: Like this one best
reviews.comment: I looked at several filters and tried 3 of them. All worked well and had something unique. One showed percentage of filtration. That was nice, because it\'s repeatable. Another had real time dimming. That was nice, because you instantly know what your getting. But, this one seems to have the most thought. It is somewhat real time. Also it provides customizable filtering, plus it can be run on schedule, and it has an on/off toggle widget. Of the ones I found, this is the most well planned and thought out.
reviews.author: Taylor McCuistion

reviews.title: luv it !!
reviews.comment: very useful ! thank you DIGIPOM !!!
reviews.author: Nor Tsang

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: This is the best filter for night use and the text is actually readable unlike many other night filters. I recommend that you try this out
reviews.author: Doug S

reviews.title: This is so much the best app on the market!!
reviews.comment: My screen is really bright. It sucks when watching something in bed before sleeping. Thanks! My favorite app for brightness and color adjustment.
reviews.author: K\303\246de van Buuren
